title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia, turned purple on Friday as K-pop stars BTS became the first non-Arab artists to hold a stadium concert in the country.Over 30-thousand people packed the King Fahd International Stadium in Riyadh to watch the K-pop sensations.BTS played a three-hour concert that had the abaya-covered fans out of their seats dancing to hit after hit.It was a rare chance for fans to dance, considering dancing in public was prohibited as recently as two years ago.Saudi Arabia was the last overseas stop of BTS's world tour,… which wraps up in Seoul with three performances later this month.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
